Ngram counter
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. py:module:: langsim.modules.ngram_counter

+------------+-------------------------------+
| Path       | langsim.modules.ngram_counter |
+------------+-------------------------------+
| Executable | yes                           |
+------------+-------------------------------+


Inputs
======

+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                                                                                                        |
+========+================================================================================================================+
| corpus | :class:`SegmentedLinesDocumentTypeTarredCorpus <pimlico.datatypes.tar.SegmentedLinesDocumentTypeTarredCorpus>` |
+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Outputs
=======

+--------+---------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                               |
+========+=======================================+
| counts | :class:`~pimlico.datatypes.core.Dict` |
+--------+---------------------------------------+

Options
=======

+----------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------+
| Name     | Description                                                                                                                 | Type  |
+==========+=============================================================================================================================+=======+
| min_prop | Minimum proportion of total count that a particular ngram must have to be stored at the end of counting. Default: store all | float |
+----------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------+
| n        | Length of ngram. Default: 2 (bigram)                                                                                        | int   |
+----------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------+
